name: ITBot - ESS - Search for Engines
description: When there is a trigger event, do action

code.name: bot_command_v2
code.description: New ESS list Engines command to Slack Workbot

input.name: list
input.description: Enter customer or license information to search:

properties.label: Search
properties.name: search
properties.hint: Acme Corp or 845184 or acmeco or acmenco-654858-0 (will search in order based on Customer Name, Customer NetSuite Internal ID, and then Engine ID)
properties.sample: Acme Corp or 845184 or acmeco or acmenco-654858-0 (will search in order based on Customer Name, Customer NetSuite Internal ID, and then Engine ID)

block.name: call_service
block.description: Call recipe Callable - Check Permission for User
block.comment: Check that the user has the itbot.ess.searchEngines permission

block.name: search_rows
block.title: Select rows in ess_license
block.description: Select rows in ess_license table in MySQL

input.orderby: customer_name ASC, customer_id ASC, license_id ASC

extended_input_schema.name: parameters
extended_input_schema.label: Parameters
extended_input_schema.hint: First provide the full name assigned to your bind variable in the WHERE condition. e.g. id Second, provide the actual parameter value. Parameter values can be static or datapills. Select the closest corresponding data type that your database is expecting for the bind variable

block.comment: First try to search based on customer name or customer internal id
